mapper.insert: INSERT INTO productQna(qnaNum, secret, question, title, block, memberId, productNum, qnaDate) VALUES(productQna_seq.NEXTVAL, #{secret}, #{question}, #{title}, 0, #{memberId}, #{productNum}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE productQna SET answer = #{answer}, answerId = #{answerId}, answerDate = SYSDATE, block = #{block} WHERE qnaNum = #{qnaNum}
